body: Yua lost her life for a long time to hunt. She turned on the wrong moon and escaped the stars, who always coaxed them to be safe. Always be safe - over and over. From the Milky Way, carried to Earth. The hunter was searching for her. In the forest she remained, pursued...

spear-wound moonlight lights their many forms 
 former selves being the scars 
 red star, rise into the air
spirits remain
they are invisible, black in the darkness
staying near the grave, eternal home
birds of lifeless flight

keeps me company
warm body and memory
you ask where i would stab you 
and bite my fingers 
a 9 lives heart remembers:
cut to pieces sewn to many
here and here - and here

galactic vampire 
to the tick of world rhythm 
dance until clock strike

falling to earth 
 made the stars 
sisters

pressure formed craters 
 different face every day
 we’re strawberry moon siblings
charon grant us safe passage
on the river styx
daughters of darkness
cousins of the light
always start anew
light aflame every night

we’re science fiction
eating my own placenta
earth life death reborn

join us in circuit ceremony
this is heart sync for robots
alchemise our earthly hearts
with fire and ice wires
violet anatomy

tell me where it hurts, give me a blade and I’ll open you up
you can spill
i don’t mind cleaning up your mess

grant me an etude
a parable, oh deity !
i’m your instrument

clover sutures flesh 
a secret will die of thirst
when finally healed

transmutate mercure 
dark concave of stick drawn runes
white shells shudder red
the promise of tide softens 
salts’ activation crests
the shore; and the ease 
of eternal rots 
charcoal 
water
sun
you

my friends are vampires
bear my neck in devotion
i hope they turn me

Ten fangs and flax blue flowers
with an early and strong fragrance
are at the doorway to an Indigo temple for moon children
Streaks from high fences mallow our skin
To be toppled by her
Decomposing into particles
like petals of a flower
Regenerate from my sacrum
Nine-lived orchid, and
Plum of the earth
A core surrounded by sweet flesh
with bright light blue shadow
The trust of young leaves
befall treetop sanctuaries
Silver ashes for a white renewal
My blood stained its bloom
the crimson life of a scarlet princess
on harvest night

Snow White dormancy
anticipating atoms
wearing silk armour
